name: BIONTINO EUROPE
goal:
Biontino Europe is a niche EU public affairs company founded in November 2005 by Sarah Biontino a former EU official. the aim is to work with the clientsâ€™ existing advisers (lawyers, economists, public relations) to provide a seamless and tailor-made service of high quality advice and representation, with a focus on competition issues not found in other similar consultancies. Biontino Europe only has very few companies that it advises on topics covered by the scope of this Transparency Register. ( see list beneath)

Biontino Europe competition team can call on an excellent track record of providing Public Affairs advice to clients in a range of complex and/or high profile competition cases. It is bound by the same rules of conduct and respect of business secrets as outside counsel.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
